content:
I notice that the inserter is being placed at (18.5, -19.5) regardless of our target position. Let's try a different approach using the drill's drop position as our reference point:

```python
# First get reference entities
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0]

print(f"Initial setup:")
print(f"Drill at {drill.position} dropping at {drill.drop_position}")
print(f"Furnace at {furnace.position}")

# Calculate inserter position - we want it exactly at the drill's drop position
target_position = Position(
    x=drill.drop_position.x,
    y=drill.drop_position.y
)

# Move to position
move_to(target_position)
print(f"Moving to position {target_position}")

# Place inserter
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, 1)
inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=target_position,
    direction=Direction.UP  # Try facing up to pick up from drill
)
print(f"Placed inserter at {inserter.position}")

# If the inserter isn't in the right spot, try to adjust its position
if abs(inserter.position.x - drill.drop_position.x) > 0.1 or abs(inserter.position.y - drill.drop_position.y) > 0.1:
    print("Inserter not in correct position, trying to adjust...")
    # Try placing it relative to the furnace instead
    new_position = Position(
        x=furnace.position.x - 1,  # One tile left of furnace
        y=furnace.position.y       # Same y as furnace
    )
    move_to(new_position)
    inserter = place_entity(
        Prototype.BurnerInserter,
        position=new_position,
        direction=Direction.RIGHT  # Face towards furnace
    )
    print(f"Adjusted inserter position to {inserter.position}")

# Add fuel to inserter
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=1)
print("Added fuel to inserter")

# Debug final setup
print(f"Final positions:")
print(f"Drill drop position: {drill.drop_position}")
print(f"Inserter position: {inserter.position}")
print(f"Inserter pickup position: {inserter.pickup_position}")
print(f"Inserter drop position: {inserter.drop_position}")
print(f"Furnace position: {furnace.position}")

# Check distances
print(f"Distances:")
print(f"Drill drop to inserter pickup: {abs(drill.drop_position.x - inserter.pickup_position.x)}, {abs(drill.drop_position.y - inserter.pickup_position.y)}")
print(f"Inserter drop to furnace: {abs(inserter.drop_position.x - furnace.position.x)}, {abs(inserter.drop_position.y - furnace.position.y)}")

print(f"Status:")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Inserter status: {inserter.status}")
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")
